availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James H. Ogden (Winchester, Kentucky, laborer and merchant)

body.p: Clark County, Kentucky, laborer and merchant. Kentucky native. Son of John Ogden and Minerva Ogden. Married to Marry Ann Baldwin in Clark County, Kentucky, on September 8, 1857. Father of Cora Ogden and Robert Ogden. Laborer in Clark County, Kentucky in 1850. Merchant in Clark County in 1860. Horse dealer in Clark County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clark County, District 1, p. 60B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clark County, Winchester, p. 877.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994032, Clark County Marriages.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994032, Clay County Deaths.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Clark County, KY, July 1863, p. 79.
